price: 97. Yallal xiibitna immay nanu diggah addunyal baxxaqqa itta makoy qellu sinnih addat sugne itta koros.
arabic: تَٱللَّهِ إِن كُنَّا لَفِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٍ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: tal-lahi in kunnā lafī ḍalālin mubīnin
